document.full_text: u.s. chemicals group dupont extended its $6 billion takeover bid for danisco by four weeks after holders of only 6 percent of the danish company's shares had accepted the offer.
document.title: dupont extends danisco offer after low uptake
lines_and_colors: u.s. chemicals group dupont extended its $6 billion takeover bid for danisco by four weeks after holders of only 6 percent of the danish company's shares had accepted the offer.
